SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ModelUpdater

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ModelUpdater
public class ModelUpdater extends Object
This class acts as the view model updater: updates the lightweight representation of the server board.

      nickname - the unique nickname identifier of the player
      isConnected - the connection status as for the moment of the displayMessage
      turn - the given player's turn

    • notifyEndgame

      public void notifyEndgame(String nickname, int score)
      Notifies the start of the endgame because the highlighted player has reached or surpassed the score marker of 20.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique player's nickname identifier
      score - the score with which he triggered the endgame

    • setDeckState

      public void setDeckState(char deck, String topId, String firstId, String secondId)
      Notifies about the current state of the deck.

      Since all three of the cards are given it means that at least all of the position of the deck have a drawable card.
      It doesn't give any information about the status of the rest of the deck.

      Parameters:
      deck - the deck identifier
      topId - the top card currently visible on the deck
      firstId - the first revealed card of the deck
      secondId - the second revealed card of the deck

    • deckUpdate

      public void deckUpdate(char deck, String revealedId, int cardPosition)
      Notifies a change in the specified deck.

      A deck has three positions to model the three visible cards of a deck:
      0 - the top card;
      1 - the first revealed card;
      2 - the second revealed card.

      A revealed card is one of the previous, as once a card is drawn another one must be revealed.

      Parameters:
      deck - the changed deck identifier
      revealedId - the identifier of the revealed card
      cardPosition - the card which was changed (top = 0, first = 1, second = 2)

    • setDeckState

      public void setDeckState(char deck, String revealedId, int cardPosition)
      Notifies about the current state of the deck.

      This displayMessage can be triggered iff in the deck remained just one card.
      The card can be only one of the revealed ones, due to the decks' rule that obliges to reveal a card after a revealed card has been drawn. This implies that cardPosition will only accept values 1 or 2.

      Parameters:
      deck - the deck identifier
      revealedId - the only revealed card remained in the deck
      cardPosition - the revealed card position

    • setDeckState

      public void setDeckState(char deck, String firstCardId, String secondCardId)
      Notifies about the current state of the identified deck.

      This displayMessage can be triggered iff the deck's face-down card pile is empty thus displaying only the two revealed cards.

      Parameters:
      deck - the deck identifier
      firstCardId - the first card identifier
      secondCardId - the second card identifier

    • emptyFaceDownPile

      public void emptyFaceDownPile(char deck)
      Updates the current deck's face-down pile to empty.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck identifier

    • emptyReveal

      public void emptyReveal(char deck, int position)
      Updates the current revealed card's position to empty.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck identifier
      position - the empty revealed card's position (1 or 2)

    • setEmptyDeckState

      public void setEmptyDeckState(char deck)
      Updates the current state of a deck to an empty state.

      This displayMessage can be triggered iff a deck is empty during initialization.

      Parameters:
      deck - the deck identifier

    • setBoardState

      public void setBoardState(int currentTurn, Map<String,Integer> scoreboard, GamePhase gamePhase, Map<String,Boolean> playerDeadLock)
      Notifies about the board initialization status.
      Parameters:
      currentTurn - the board current turn at initialization
      scoreboard - current scoreboard state
      gamePhase - the game phase at initialization
      playerDeadLock - current player deadlocks

    • setPlayerHandState

      public void setPlayerHandState(String nickname, List<String> playCardIDs, List<String> objectiveCardIDs, String startingCardID)
      Notifies about the current player's hand status.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique player's identifier
      playCardIDs - the list of IDs of playable cards in the player's hand (can be empty)
      objectiveCardIDs - the list of IDs of objective cards in the player's hand (can be empty)
      startingCardID - the ID of the starting card in the player's hand (can be null)

    • playerHandAddedCardUpdate

      Updates the current player's hand status after a card was added to it.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique player's identifier
      drawnCardId - the id of the card added in the hand

      Updates the current player's hand status after a card was removed.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique player's id
      playCardId - the played card identifier

      Updates the current player's hand status after an objective card was drawn.

      nickname - the unique player's identifier
      objectiveCardID - the added objective card's id

      startingCardId - the id of the given starting card

    • setPlayAreaState

      public void setPlayAreaState(String nickname, List<CardPosition> cardPositions, Map<GameResource,Integer> visibleResources, List<SerializableCorner> freeSerializableCorners)
      Notifies about the player's play area status.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the play area owner's id
      cardPositions - a list/set of CardPosition representing the play area (can be empty)
      visibleResources - a map of the current visible resources on the player's play area (can be empty)
      freeSerializableCorners - a representation of the free corners in the player's play area (can be empty)

    • updatePlaceCard

      public void updatePlaceCard(String nickname, String placedCardId, int row, int col, boolean placeOnFront)
      Notifies about card's placement.

      The parameter (0,0) is strictly associated to the starting card.
      Therefore if this parameter is read when a non-starting card is passed that an error must occur.

      Parameters:
      nickname - the play area owner's identifier
      placedCardId - the placed card's identifier
      row - the row in which the card was placed
      col - the column in which the card was placed
      placeOnFront - the side on which to place the card

    • visibleResourcesUpdate

      public void visibleResourcesUpdate(String nickname, Map<GameResource,Integer> visibleResources)
      Updates the visible resources map.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the play area owner's id
      visibleResources - the current visible resources in the play area

    • freeCornersUpdate

      public void freeCornersUpdate(String nickname, List<SerializableCorner> freeSerializableCorners)
      The list of current free corners represented so that they are serializable.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the play area owner's id
      freeSerializableCorners - the current list of free corners
